mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN id = #{id} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS id_dup_yn , MAX(CASE WHEN nickname = #{nickname} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS name_dup_yn FROM user_info WHERE id = #{id} OR nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info VALUES(#{id}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{description}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW(), null)
mapper.select: SELECT a.team_id , b.name , b.ci_path , CASE WHEN a.role_code = 'O' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS owner_yn FROM team_user_mapping a INNER JOIN team_info b ON a.team_id = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.use_yn = 'Y'
